SEARCH
Package model.placementArea

Class Coordinates

java.lang.Object
model.placementArea.Coordinates
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Coordinates extends Object implements Serializable
the class coordinates facilitates the use of a cartesian plane as model for the Placement Area of the players

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Coordinates xy)
      This method checks if the provided coordinates are equal to the current coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xy - The coordinates to compare with.
      Returns:
      True if the x and y values of the provided coordinates are equal to the x and y values of the current coordinates, false otherwise.
